mapper.select: select diaryNo, userNo, to_char(diaryDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') diaryDate, weather, protect, title, diaryBgmSrc from diary where userNo = #{userNo} order by diaryDate desc
select diaryNo, userNo, to_char(diaryDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD')diaryDate, weather, protect, title, diaryBgmSrc from diary where diaryNo = #{diaryNo}

select i.diaryItemNo, i.diaryNo, i.stickerNo, i.stickerSrc, i.top, i.left, i.scaleX, i.scaleY, i.angle, i.text, s.stickerCateNo from item i, sticker s where i.stickerNo = s.stickerNo and diaryNo = #{diaryNo}
select stickerNo, stickerCateNo, stickerSrc, stickerName from sticker where stickerCateNo = #{stickerCateNo}
mapper.insert: insert into diary(diaryNo, userNo, diaryDate, weather, protect, title) values(seq_diary_no.nextval, #{userNo}, #{diaryDate}, #{weather}, #{protect}, #{title})

insert into item(diaryitemNo, diaryNo, stickerNo, stickerSrc, top, left, scaleX, scaleY, angle, text) values(seq_diaryitem_no.nextval, #{diaryNo}, #{stickerNo}, #{stickerSrc}, #{top}, #{left}, #{scaleX}, #{scaleY}, #{angle}, #{text})
